strings.Value: "You know, Linzi, your writing aspirations are quite commendable. But the way you're going about it... Without a proper academic education – you'll never rise above writing cheap tales for peasants!"

"I've seen this 'academic education' of yours. A pack of arrogant peacocks trying to outshine each other with their highbrow talk. Hell no, I'd rather write my tales than become a smug toad like those 'professors'!"
